ygData.subject: RE: Putting Skill-Cap Questions to Rest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We have space allocated by Onelist for things like this.  Please send it directly to me, I will upload and provide the URL.  I d rather not have any more
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:44 PM 9/28/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>I have that info on my chart and will publish my info to you all when I feel
>that the skill cap stuff is accurate enough. If no one minds I will send
>the chart as a Word97 format attachement verified virus free when complete.

We have space allocated by Onelist for things like this. Please send it
directly to me, I will upload and provide the URL. I'd rather not have any
more files going through, and I'm sure our Euro friends will appreciate the
option.


Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
